comments.name: brantwynn
comments.comment: Would love to see this on github!

I've just finished a project similar to the one I did back in Jan (in Silex - hence this article), only this time I decided to use Symfony2 Standard Edition instead of Silex. Based on the Drupal integration code from my Silex app, this time round I built a Symfony2 bundle, which provides the integration functionality in a more convenient and more reusable form. You can find the Jaza/DrupalIntegrationBundle code on GitHub (also listed on Packagist). The README has all the installation / configuration instructions you should need (let me know if anything is missing or buggy). Hope this new bundle is of use!
